description.english: Reach highest reputation with any faction.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello più alto di reputazione con ogni fazione.
description.schinese: 与任意一个派系达到最高声望等级。
description.tchinese: 與任意一個派系達到最高聲望等級。
description.german: Erreiche das höchstmögliche Ansehen mit einer beliebigen Fraktion.
description.french: Atteignez la plus haute réputation auprès de n'importe quelle faction.
description.koreana: 한 세력에서 가장 높은 평판을 얻으십시오.
description.russian: Достигните высшей репутации в любой фракции.

description.english: Get one billion Credits in your account.
description.italian: Accumula un miliardo di crediti sul tuo conto.
description.schinese: 向账户存入10亿信用币。
description.tchinese: 向賬戶存入10億信用幣。
description.german: Fülle dein Konto mit einer Milliarde Credits.
description.french: Atteignez un milliard de crédits sur votre compte.
description.russian: Соберите один миллиард кредитов на своем счету.

displayName.french: Plus vite, plus haut, plus fort

description.english: Maximally upgrade the Albion Skunk.
description.italian: Potenzia al massimo l'Albion Skunk.
description.schinese: 将阿尔比恩臭鼬升级到极致。
description.tchinese: 將阿爾比恩臭鼬升級到極致。
description.german: Führe alle möglichen Erweiterungen bei der Albion Skunk durch.
description.french: Améliorez le Sconse d'Albion au maximum.
description.russian: Максимально усовершенствуйте Скунс Альбиона.

description.english: Finish 33 escort missions.
description.italian: Completa 33 missioni di scorta.
description.schinese: 完成33次护送任务。
description.tchinese: 完成33次護送任務。
description.german: Beende 33 Eskort-Missionen.
description.french: Terminez 33 missions d'escorte.
description.russian: Завершите 33 миссии по сопровождению.

description.english: Finish 20 passenger transport missions.
description.italian: Finisci 20 missioni di trasporto passeggeri.
description.schinese: 完成20次旅客运送任务。
description.tchinese: 完成20次旅客運送任務。
description.german: Beende 20 Passagiertransport-Missionen.
description.french: Terminez 20 missions de transport de passagers.
description.russian: Завершите 20 миссий по перевозке пассажиров.

description.english: Reach maximal boost speed in a highway.
description.italian: Raggiungi la massima velocità dentro un'ipervia.
description.schinese: 在高速航线内达到最高推进速度。
description.tchinese: 在高速航線內達到最高推進速度。
description.german: Erreiche die maximale Turbogeschwindigkeit in einem Highway.
description.french: Atteignez la vitesse turbo maximale sur autoroute.
description.russian: Развейте максимальную скорость на магистрали.

description.english: Destroy the jump drive of a capital ship.
description.italian: Distruggi il Jump Drive di una capital ship.
description.schinese: 摧毁一艘主力舰的跳跃驱动器。
description.tchinese: 摧毀一艘主力艦的跳躍驅動器。
description.german: Zerstöre den Sprungantrieb eines Großschiffes.
description.french: Détruisez le moteur de saut d'un vaisseau de ligne.
description.russian: Уничтожьте прыжковый двигатель на крупном корабле.

description.english: Destroy the engines of a capital ship.
description.italian: Distruggi i motori di una capital ship.
description.schinese: 摧毁一艘主力舰的引擎。
description.tchinese: 摧毀一艘主力艦的引擎。
description.german: Zerstöre die Triebwerke eines Großschiffes.
description.french: Détruisez les moteurs d'un vaisseau de ligne.
description.russian: Уничтожьте двигатели на крупном корабле.

description.english: Destroy 777 ships.
description.italian: Distruggi 777 navi.
description.schinese: 摧毁777艘飞船。
description.tchinese: 摧毀777艘飛船。
description.german: Zerstöre 777 Schiffe.
description.french: Détruisez 777 vaisseaux.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 777 кораблей.

description.english: Destroy 100 turrets.
description.italian: Distruggi 100 torrette.
description.schinese: 摧毁100架炮塔。
description.tchinese: 摧毀100架炮塔。
description.german: Zerstöre 100 Geschütztürme.
description.french: Détruisez 100 tourelles.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 100 турелей.

description.english: Destroy a Xenon capital ship.
description.italian: Distruggi una capital ship Xenon.
description.schinese: 摧毁一艘Xenon主力舰。
description.tchinese: 摧毀一艘Xenon主力艦。
description.german: Zerstöre ein Großschiff der Xenon.
description.french: Détruisez un vaisseau de ligne Xénon.
description.russian: Уничтожьте ксенонский крупный корабль.

description.english: Have Yisha stay longer than you both expected.
description.italian: Tieni a bordo Yisha più a lungo del previsto.
description.schinese: 让伊莎呆得比你们俩预料的都久。
description.tchinese: 讓伊莎呆得比你們倆預料的都久。
description.german: Behalte Yisha länger an Bord, als ihr beide erwartet habt.
description.french: Avoir Yisha qui reste plus longtemps que ce que vous vous attendiez tous les deux.
description.koreana: 이샤를 생각보다 길게 스컹크호에 머무르게 하십시오.
description.russian: Пусть Йиша останется дольше, чем вы оба ожидали.

description.english: Acquire weapons from Heart of Albion contact.
description.italian: Acquisisci le armi dal contatto della Cuore di Albion.
description.schinese: 从阿尔比恩之心的线人那里获得武器。
description.tchinese: 從阿爾比恩之心的線人那裡獲得武器。
description.german: Erhalte Waffen von einem Herz von Albion Kontakt.
description.french: Obtenez des armes de votre contact du Coeur d'Albion.
description.koreana: 하트 오브 알비온의 연락책으로부터 무기를 얻으십시오.
description.russian: Получите оружие от связного 'Сердца Альбиона'.

description.english: Make your first friends outside of Albion.
description.italian: Fai i tuoi primi amici fuori da Albion.
description.schinese: 在阿尔比恩以外结交第一位朋友。
description.tchinese: 在阿爾比恩以外結交第一位朋友。
description.german: Gewinne neue Freunde außerhalb von Albion.
description.french: Faites vous votre premier ami en dehors d'Albion.
description.russian: Заведите себе первого друга вне Альбиона.

description.english: Reacquire your ships and crews.
description.italian: Riacquisisci le tue navi e i tuoi equipaggi.
description.schinese: 重新夺回你的飞船和船员。
description.tchinese: 重新奪回你的飛船和船員。
description.german: Hole dir deine Schiffe und Mannschaft zurück.
description.french: Récupérez vos vaisseaux et vos équipages.
description.russian: Верните свои корабли и команды.

description.english: Help forge a key alliance.
description.italian: Aiuta a formare l'alleanza chiave.
description.schinese: 协助缔造关键同盟。
description.tchinese: 協助締造關鍵同盟。
description.german: Hilf dabei, eine wichtige Allianz zu formen.
description.french: Aidez à forger une alliance clé.
description.russian: Помогите создать ключевой альянс.

description.english: Collect 100 Xenon components.
description.italian: Raccogli 100 componenti Xenon.
description.schinese: 收集100个Xenon部件。
description.tchinese: 收集100個Xenon部件。
description.german: Sammle 100 Xenonkomponenten.
description.french: Collectez 100 composants Xénons.
description.russian: Соберите 100 ксенонских компонентов.

description.english: Transport an important dignitary on a diplomatic mission.
description.italian: Trasporta un importante dignitario durante una missione diplomatica.
description.schinese: 在外交任务中运送一位重要使节。
description.tchinese: 在外交任務中運送一位重要使節。
description.german: Befördere einen wichtigen Würdenträger auf seiner diplomatischen Mission.
description.french: Transportez un dignitaire important lors d'une mission diplomatique.
description.koreana: 외교 임무에서 스플릿 고위 관리를 수송하십시오.
description.russian: Перевезите важного сановника на дипломатическую миссию.

displayName.german: Das hält sie nicht lange auf

description.english: Help take out key Xenon facilities.
description.italian: Aiuta ad eliminare gli impianti chiave degli Xenon.
description.schinese: 协助摧毁Xenon的关键设施。
description.tchinese: 協助摧毀Xenon的關鍵設施。
description.german: Hilf bei der Vernichtung von Einrichtungen der Xenon.
description.french: Aidez à détruire les installations Xénons.
description.koreana: 중요 제논 시설을 파괴하는 것을 도우십시오.
description.russian: Помогите уничтожить ключевые ксенонские предприятия.

description.english: Build your first station.
description.italian: Costruisci la tua prima stazione.
description.schinese: 建造你的第一座空间站。
description.tchinese: 建造你的第一座空間站。
description.german: Errichte deine erste Station.
description.french: Construisez votre première station.
description.russian: Постройте свою первую станцию.

description.english: Force 50 pilots to abandon their ships.
description.german: Zwinge 50 Piloten zur Aufgabe ihrer Schiffe.
description.french: Forcez 50 pilotes à abandonner leurs vaisseaux.
description.italian: Costringi 50 piloti ad abbandonare la nave.
description.schinese: 迫使50名飞行员弃船。
description.tchinese: 迫使50名飛行員棄船。
description.russian: Заставьте 50 пилотов покинуть корабль.

description.english: Board a capital ship.
description.italian: Abborda una capital ship.
description.schinese: 登船占领一艘主力舰。
description.tchinese: 登船佔領一艘主力艦。
description.german: Entere ein Großschiff.
description.french: Abordez un vaisseau de ligne.
description.russian: Возьмите на абордаж крупный корабль.

description.english: Upgrade a Marine Officer to five skill stars.
description.italian: Addestra un Ufficiale dei Marine fino ad avere 5 stelle.
description.schinese: 让一位登陆作战指挥官达到五项技能满星。
description.tchinese: 讓一位登陸作戰指揮官達到五項技能滿星。
description.german: Befördere einen Enterkapitän auf fünf Sterne in seinen Fähigkeiten.
description.french: Améliorez un officier d'abordage jusqu'à cinq étoiles d'aptitude.
description.russian: Развейте способности военно-космического офицера до пяти звезд.

description.english: Earn the Argon Secret Service Licence.
description.italian: Ottieni l'abilitazione come Agente Segreto Argon.
description.schinese: 获得Argon特勤局执照。
description.tchinese: 獲得Argon特勤局執照。
description.german: Verdiene dir die Argonische Geheimdienst-Lizenz.
description.french: Obtenez la licence des services secrets Argon
description.russian: Получите лицензию Аргонской секретной службы.

description.english: Use a Remote Transport Drone for express delivery.
description.italian: Usa un Drone da Trasporto Remoto per una consegna veloce.
description.schinese: 使用远程运输无人机实施运输。
description.tchinese: 使用遠程運輸無人機實施運輸。
description.german: Nutze eine Ferntransportdrohne für eine Expresslieferung.
description.french: Utilisez un drone de transport distant pour une livraison expresse
description.koreana: 빠른 배달을 위해 원격 수송 드론을 이용하십시오.
description.russian: Используйте радиоуправляемый транспортный дрон для быстрой доставки.

displayName.italian: Il postino bussa sempre due volte
displayName.french: Le postier sonne toujours deux fois

description.english: Spend 100,000 Cr on remote transport fees.
description.italian: Spendi 100.000 Cr in tariffe per il trasporto remoto
description.schinese: 在远程运输上花费100,000 Cr。
description.tchinese: 在遠程運輸上花費100,000 Cr。
description.german: Gib 100.000 Cr für Ferntransportgebühren aus.
description.french: Dépensez 100 000 Crédits en frais de transport distant
description.russian: Потратьте 100 000 кр. на оплату удаленной транспортировки.

displayName.italian: Non Entrare più in una Stazione
displayName.french: N'entrez plus jamais dans une station

description.english: Spend 1,000,000 Cr on remote transport fees.
description.italian: Spendi 1.000.000 Cr in tariffe per il trasporto remoto
description.schinese: 在远程运输上花费1,000,000 Cr。
description.tchinese: 在遠程運輸上花費1,000,000 Cr。
description.german: Gib 1.000.000 Cr für Ferntransportgebühren aus.
description.french: Dépensez 1 000 000 Crédits en frais de transport distant
description.russian: Потратьте 1 000 000 кр. на оплату удаленной транспортировки.

description.english: Fly 299,792 km in superhighways.
description.italian: Vola per 299.727 km nelle Super Ipervie
description.schinese: 在超级高速航线中飞行299,792公里。
description.tchinese: 在超級高速航線中飛行299,792公里。
description.german: Fliege 299.792 km in Superhighways.
description.french: Volez 299 792 km dans les super autoroutes
description.russian: Пролетите 299 792 км в супермагистралях.

displayName.italian: Dalla Terra alla Luna e Ritorno

description.english: Fly 800,000 km in superhighways.
description.italian: Vola per 800.000 km nelle Super Ipervie
description.schinese: 在超级高速航线中飞行800,000公里。
description.tchinese: 在超級高速航線中飛行800,000公里。
description.german: Fliege 800.000 km in Superhighways.
description.french: Volez 800 000 km dans les super autoroutes
description.russian: Пролетите 800 000 км в супермагистралях.

description.english: Fly 17,987,548 km in superhighways.
description.italian: Vola per 17.987.548 km nelle Super Ipervie
description.schinese: 在超级高速航线中飞行17,987,548公里.
description.tchinese: 在超級高速航線中飛行17,987,548公里.
description.german: Fliege 17.987.548 km in Superhighways.
description.french: Volez 17 987 548 km dans les super autoroutes
description.russian: Пролетите 17 987 548 км в супермагистралях.

description.english: Play for 10 hours on Hard difficulty.
description.italian: Gioca 10 ore a difficoltà Difficile
description.schinese: 在困难难度中游戏10小时。
description.tchinese: 在困難難度中遊戲10小時。
description.german: Spiele 10 Stunden auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Jouez pendant 10 heures en difficile
description.russian: Проведите в игре 10 часов на уровне сложности 'Сложно'.

displayName.italian: Lo spazio è la mia casa

description.english: Play for 50 hours on Hard difficulty.
description.italian: Gioca 50 ore a difficoltà Difficile
description.schinese: 在困难难度中游戏50小时。
description.tchinese: 在困難難度中遊戲50小時。
description.german: Spiele 50 Stunden auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Jouez pendant 50 heures en difficile
description.russian: Проведите в игре 50 часов на уровне сложности 'Сложно'.

description.english: Play for 200 hours on Hard difficulty.
description.italian: Gioca 200 ore a difficoltà Difficile
description.schinese: 在困难难度中游戏200小时。
description.tchinese: 在困難難度中遊戲200小時。
description.german: Spiele 200 Stunden auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Jouez pendant 200 heures en difficile
description.russian: Проведите в игре 200 часов на уровне сложности 'Сложно'.

displayName.german: Das hält sie nicht lange auf (Schwer)

description.english: Help take out key Xenon facilities on Hard difficulty.
description.italian: Aiuta ad eliminare gli impianti chiave degli Xenon giocando a difficoltà Difficile.
description.schinese: 在困难难度中协助摧毁Xenon的关键设施。
description.tchinese: 在困難難度中協助摧毀Xenon的關鍵設施。
description.german: Hilf bei der Vernichtung von Einrichtungen der Xenon auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Aidez à détruire les fabriques clés Xénons en difficile
description.koreana: 어려움 난이도에서 중요 제논 시설을 파괴하는 것을 도우십시오.
description.russian: Помогите уничтожить ключевые ксенонские предприятия на уровне сложности 'Сложно'.

description.english: Earn the Argon Secret Service Licence on Hard difficulty.
description.italian: Ottieni l'abilitazione come Agente Segreto Argon giocando a difficoltà Difficile.
description.schinese: 在困难难度中获得Argon特勤局执照。
description.tchinese: 在困難難度中獲得Argon特勤局執照。
description.german: Verdiene dir die Argonische Geheimdienst-Lizenz auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Obtenez la licence Argon des services secrets en difficile
description.koreana: 어려움 난이도에서 아르곤 비밀 요원 면허를 획득하십시오.
description.russian: Получите лицензию Аргонской секретной службы в режиме игры 'Сложно'.

description.english: Destroy a Xenon capital ship on Hard difficulty.
description.german: Zerstöre ein Xenon Großschiff auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Détruisez un vaisseau capital Xénon en difficile
description.italian: Distruggi una capital ship Xenon giocando a difficoltà Difficile.
description.schinese: 在困难难度中摧毁一艘Xenon主力舰。

description.schinese: 在困难难度中向账户存入10亿信用币。

description.french: Détruisez 100 tourelles en difficile

description.english: Force 50 pilots to abandon their ships on Hard difficulty.
description.german: Zwinge 50 Piloten zur Aufgabe ihrer Schiffe auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Forcez 50 pilotes à abandonner leurs vaisseaux en difficile.
description.italian: Costringi 50 piloti ad abbandonare la nave a difficoltà Difficile.
description.koreana: 어려움 난이도에서 조종사 50명이 배를 강제로 버리도록 만들기.
description.schinese: 困难模式下迫使50名飞行员弃船。
description.tchinese: 困難模式下迫使50名飛行員棄船。
description.russian: Заставьте 50 пилотов покинуть корабль на уровне 'Сложно'.

description.english: Board a capital ship on Hard difficulty.
description.italian: Abborda una capital ship giocando a difficoltà Difficile.
description.schinese: 在困难难度中登船占领一艘主力舰。
description.tchinese: 在困難難度中登船佔領一艘主力艦。
description.german: Entere ein Großschiff auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Abordez un vaisseau de ligne en difficile
description.russian: Возьмите на абордаж крупный корабль в режиме игры 'Сложно'.

description.english: Collect 100 Xenon components on Hard difficulty.
description.german: Sammle 100 Xenonkomponenten auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Collectez 100 composants Xénons en difficile
description.italian: Raccogli 100 componenti Xenon giocando a difficoltà Difficile.
description.schinese: 再困难难度中收集100个Xenon部件。
description.tchinese: 再困難難度中收集100個Xenon部件。
description.russian: Соберите 100 ксенонских компонентов в режиме игры 'Сложно'.

description.english: Complete The Rising Tide mission (requires The Teladi Outpost DLC).
description.german: Schließe die Springflut-Mission ab (benötigt den 'The Teladi Outpost'-DLC).
description.french: Complétez la mission Marée Montante (nécessite le DLC The Teladi Outpost)
description.schinese: 完成大浪淘沙任务（需要Teladi前哨站DLC）。
description.tchinese: 完成大浪淘沙任務（需要Teladi前哨站DLC）。
description.koreana: 높아지는 파고 임무를 완료하십시오.(텔라디 전초기지 DLC가 필요합니다)
description.italian: Completa la missione La Marea Crescente (richiede il DLC l'Avamposto Teladi).
description.russian: Завершите миссию 'Прилив' (требуется дополнение 'Teladi Outpost').

displayName.italian: Con le Unghie e con i Denti

description.english: Equip all primary Teladi weapons (requires The Teladi Outpost DLC).
description.german: Rüste die Albion Skunk mit allen primären Teladi-Waffen aus (benötigt den 'The Teladi Outpost'-DLC).
description.french: Equipez toutes les armes principales Teladi (nécessite le DLC The Teladi Outpost)
description.italian: Equipaggia tutte le armi primarie Teladi (richiede il DLC l'Avamposto Teladi).
description.koreana: 모든 텔라디 주요 무기들을 장비하십시오.(텔라디 전초기지 DLC가 필요합니다)
description.schinese: 装备所有Teladi主武器（需要Teladi前哨站DLC）。
description.tchinese: 裝備所有Teladi主武器（需要Teladi前哨站DLC）。
description.russian: Установите все основное вооружение телади (требуется дополнение 'Teladi Outpost').

description.english: Discover all zones in Fields of Opportunity (requires The Teladi Outpost DLC).
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in Heimat des Profits (benötigt den 'The Teladi Outpost'-DLC).
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones dans Champs d'Opportunité (nécessite le DLC The Teladi Outpost)
description.schinese: 探索机遇之地所有区域（需要Teladi前哨站DLC）。
description.tchinese: 探索機遇之地所有區域（需要Teladi前哨站DLC）。
description.koreana: 필드 오브 오퍼튜니티의 모든 지역을 탐험하십시오.(텔라디 전초기지 DLC가 필요합니다)
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di Campi di Opportunità (richiede il DLC l'Avamposto Teladi).
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Полях Возможностей (требуется дополнение 'Teladi Outpost').

description.english: Find and open 33 lock-boxes.
description.german: Finde und öffne 33 Sicherheitscontainer.
description.french: Trouvez et ouvrez 33 conteneurs verrouillées
description.schinese: 发现并打开33个宝箱。
description.tchinese: 發現並打開33個寶箱。
description.italian: Trova e apri 33 container blindati.
description.russian: Найдите и откройте 33 запертых сундучка.

description.english: Build 10 stations.
description.german: Errichte 10 Stationen.
description.french: Construisez 10 stations
description.schinese: 建造10个空间站
description.tchinese: 建造10個空間站
description.italian: Costruisci 10 stazioni.
description.russian: Постройте 10 станций.

description.english: Discover all zones in Albion.
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in Albion.
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones d'Albion
description.schinese: 探索阿尔比恩的所有地区。
description.tchinese: 探索阿爾比恩的所有地區。
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di Albion.
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Альбионе.

description.english: Discover all zones in Omicron Lyrae.
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in Omicron Lyrae.
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones d'Omicron Lyrae
description.schinese: 探索天琴座Omicron的所有地区。
description.tchinese: 探索天琴座Omicron的所有地區。
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di Omicron Lyrae.
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Омикроне Лиры.

description.english: Discover all zones in DeVries.
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in DeVries.
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones de DeVries
description.schinese: 探索德弗里斯的所有地区。
description.tchinese: 探索德弗裡斯的所有地區。
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di DeVries.
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Де Фризе.

description.english: Discover all zones in Maelstrom.
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in Mahlstrom.
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones de Maelstrom
description.schinese: 探索大漩涡的所有地区。
description.tchinese: 探索大漩渦的所有地區。
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di Maelstrom.
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Мальстриме.

displayName.english: It fell out of a ship.
displayName.italian: Qualcuno si è perso il carico.

description.english: Pick up 99 containers in space.
description.german: Sammle 99 Container im Weltraum auf.
description.french: Récupérez 99 conteneurs dans l'espace
description.schinese: 在太空打捞99个集装箱。
description.tchinese: 在太空打撈99個集裝箱。
description.italian: Raccogli 99 container nello spazio.
description.russian: Соберите 99 контейнеров в космосе.

description.english: Unlock 100% information of a station.
description.german: Schalte 100 % der Informationen einer Station frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez 100% des informations d'une station
description.schinese: 解锁一个空间站100%的信息。
description.tchinese: 解鎖一個空間站100%的信息。
description.italian: Sblocca il 100% delle informazioni di una stazione.
description.russian: Разблокируйте 100% информации о станции.

description.english: Perform extended small talk with perfect confidence.
description.german: Führe ein erweitertes Smalltalk-Gespräch mit absoluter Zuversicht.
description.french: Réussissez une conversation en atteignant une confiance parfaite
description.schinese: 带着完美的信心进行完整的闲谈。
description.tchinese: 帶著完美的信心進行完整的閒談。
description.italian: Intrattieni lunghi convenevoli con perfetta confidenza.
description.russian: Проведите долгую и успешную беседу.

description.english: Subscribe to trade offers on 50 different stations.
description.german: Sammle Handelsangebote auf 50 verschiedenen Stationen.
description.french: Concluez des échanges commerciaux sur 50 stations différentes
description.schinese: 在50个不同的空间站订阅贸易信息。
description.tchinese: 在50個不同的空間站訂閱貿易信息。
description.koreana: 서로 다른 스테이션에서 50개의 거래 제안을 구독하십시오.
description.italian: Sottoscrivi offerte commerciali su 50 stazioni differenti.
description.russian: Подпишитесь на торговые предложения на 50 различных станциях.

description.english: Install a weapon mod.
description.german: Installiere eine Waffenmod.
description.french: Installez une modification d'arme.
description.italian: Installa una modifica d'arma.
description.schinese: 安装一个武器模块。
description.tchinese: 安裝一個武器模塊。
description.russian: Установите модификацию оружия.

displayName.english: Let's do the Time Warp again!
displayName.german: Lass uns durch die Zeit reisen
displayName.italian: Let's do the Time Warp again!

description.english: Craft SETA.
description.german: Stelle einen SINZA her.
description.french: Fabriquez le MATS.
description.italian: Costruisci l'ATS.
description.schinese: 制作SETA
description.tchinese: 製作SETA
description.russian: Изготовьте СУВ.

description.english: Complete the "X-Perimental" mission and install the Experimental Jump Drive on the Albion Skunk.
description.german: Schließe die Mission "X-Perimental" ab und installiere den Experimentellen Sprungantrieb auf der Albion Skunk.
description.french: Terminez la mission "X-Perimental" et installez le moteur de saut expérimental sur le Sconse d'Albion.
description.italian: Completa la missione "X-Perimental" e installa il Jumpdrive Sperimentale sull'Albion Skunk.
description.koreana: "X-Perimental"임무를 완료하고 시험용 점프 드라이브를 알비온 스컹크호에 설치하기.
description.schinese: 完成“X-Perimental”任务，在阿尔比恩臭鼬上安装实验跳跃驱动器。
description.tchinese: 完成「X-Perimental」任務，在阿爾比恩臭鼬上安裝實驗跳躍驅動器。
description.russian: Выполните миссию 'X-Perimental' и установите Экспериментальный Прыжковый Двигатель на Альбионский Скунс.

description.english: Pass the Flight School.
description.german: Bestehe die Flugschule.
description.french: Finissez l'école de pilotage
description.italian: Passa la Scuola di Volo.
description.schinese: 通过飞行学校教程
description.tchinese: 通過飛行學校教程
description.russian: Пройдите 'Летную школу'.

description.english: Discover all zones in Home of Light (requires Home of Light DLC).
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in Heimat des Lichts (benötigt den 'Home of Light'-DLC).
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones de Terre de Lumière (DLC Home of Light requis).
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di Terra di Luce (Richiede il DLC Home of Light).
description.koreana: 홈 오브 라이트의 모든 지역 발견하기 (홈 오브 라이트 DLC 필요).
description.schinese: 探索光之家园的所有地区（需要光之家园DLC）。
description.tchinese: 探索光之家園的所有地區（需要光之家園DLC）。
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Обители света (требуется дополнение 'Home of Light').

description.english: Discover all zones in Cold Star (requires Home of Light DLC).
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in Froststern (benötigt den 'Home of Light'-DLC).
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones d'Etoile Froide (DLC Home of Light requis).
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di Stella Fredda (Richiede il DLC Home of Light).
description.koreana: 콜드 스타의 모든 지역 발견하기 (홈 오브 라이트 DLC 필요).
description.schinese: 探索冷星的所有地区（需要光之家园DLC）。
description.tchinese: 探索冷星的所有地區（需要光之家園DLC）。
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Холодной звезде (требуется дополнение 'Home of Light').

description.english: Discover all zones in Toride (requires Home of Light DLC).
description.german: Entdecke alle Zonen in Toride (benötigt den 'Home of Light'-DLC).
description.french: Découvrez toutes les zones de Bastion (DLC Home of Light requis).
description.italian: Scopri tutte le zone di Toride (Richiede il DLC Home of Light).
description.koreana: 토리드의 모든 지역 발견하기 (홈 오브 라이트 DLC 필요).
description.schinese: 探索棱堡的所有地区（需要光之家园DLC）。
description.tchinese: 探索稜堡的所有地區（需要光之家園DLC）。
description.russian: Найдите все зоны в Ториде (требуется дополнение 'Home of Light').

displayName.french: Je trouve, je garde - très difficile

description.english: Force 50 pilots to abandon their ships on Very Hard difficulty.
description.german: Zwinge 50 Piloten zur Aufgabe ihrer Schiffe auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Sehr Schwer.
description.french: Forcez 50 pilotes à abandonner leurs vaisseaux en Très Difficile.
description.italian: Costringi 50 piloti ad abbandonare la nave a difficoltà Molto Difficile.
description.koreana: 매우 어려움 난이도에서 조종사 50명이 배를 강제로 버리도록 만들기.
description.schinese: 非常困难模式迫使50名飞行员弃船。
description.tchinese: 非常困難模式迫使50名飛行員棄船。
description.russian: Заставьте 50 пилотов покинуть корабль на уровне 'Очень сложно'

description.english: Rename an area of empty space where you have a station.
description.german: Benenne eine leere Raumregion um, in der du eine Station hast.
description.french: Renommez une partie de l'espace vide sur lequel vous avez une station.
description.italian: Rinomina un'area di spazio vuoto dove hai una stazione.
description.koreana: 내 소유의 스테이션이 있는 빈 우주의 이름 바꾸기.
description.schinese: 重命名一个你拥有空间站的空白空间
description.tchinese: 重命名一個你擁有空間站的空白空間
description.russian: Переименуйте зону пустого пространства, в которой имеется ваша станция.

description.english: Destroy all the surface elements on a capital ship.
description.german: Zerstöre alle Oberflächenelemente eines Großschiffs.
description.french: Détruisez tous les éléments de surface d'un vaisseau de ligne.
description.italian: Distruggi tutti gli elementi di superficie di una nave capital.
description.schinese: 摧毁一艘主力舰的所有表面部件
description.tchinese: 摧毀一艘主力艦的所有表面部件
description.russian: Уничтожьте все внешние элементы крупного корабля.

description.english: Destroy 20 Ad Signs.
description.german: Zerstöre 20 Werbetafeln.
description.french: Détruisez 20 panneaux publicitaires.
description.italian: Distruggi 20 cartelloni pubblicitari.
description.schinese: 摧毁20个广告标识
description.tchinese: 摧毀20個廣告標識
description.russian: Уничтожьте 20 рекламных щитов.

description.english: Destroy 10 unidentifiable ships on Very Hard difficulty (requires Home of Light DLC).
description.german: Zerstöre 10 unidentifizierbare Schiffe auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Sehr Schwer (benötigt den 'Home of Light'-DLC).
description.french: Détruisez 10 vaisseaux non identifiés en Très Difficile (DLC Home of Light requis).
description.italian: Distruggi 10 navi non identificate a difficoltà Molto Difficile (Richiede il DLC Home of Light).
description.koreana: 매우 어려움 난이도에서 확인 불가 함선 10척 파괴하기 (홈 오브 라이트 DLC 필요).
description.schinese: 非常困难模式中摧毁10艘无法识别的飞船（需要光之家园DLC）。
description.tchinese: 非常困難模式中摧毀10艘無法識別的飛船（需要光之家園DLC）。
description.russian: Уничтожьте 10 неидентифицируемых кораблей на уровне 'Очень сложно' (требуется дополнение 'Home of Light').
